Name: Orgullo
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Mandarin reduction with fresh lemon juice.
History: Czech Republic Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Miloš Danihelka, L´Fleur Bar, Prague.
Nutrition: One serving of Orgullo contains 181 calories
